components.description:
A balloon on a string, as decorates a birthday party. Generally depicted in red, though WhatsApp’s is pink and Google’s orangish-red.

Commonly used to convey congratulations and celebration, especially when wishing someone a happy birthday.

Microsoft and Samsung's balloons were previously blue; SoftBank's was shown floating in the sky.
components.title: Balloon

description:
A balloon on a string, as decorates a birthday party. Generally depicted in red, though WhatsApp’s is pink and Google’s orangish-red.

Commonly used to convey congratulations and celebration, especially when wishing someone a happy birthday.

Microsoft and Samsung's balloons were previously blue; SoftBank's was shown floating in the sky.
title: Balloon

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Celebration symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A single balloon, used for birthdays and other celebrations. Displayed as red on most platforms, except Samsung Â which displaysÂ a blue ballo http://emojipedia.org/balloon/
emoji_net_data.name: balloon

bn:00091457v: Have or participate in a party

bn:00016988n: Formal performance of a solemn rite.
The public performance of a sacrament or solemn ceremony with all appropriate ritual
Performance of a ceremony (in an appropriate and solemn manner), such as performing a marriage.
The formal performance of a solemn rite, such as Christian sacrament

bn:00010679n: The date and year something was born.
The year, month, and day of someone's birth; date of birth
Date and year when something was born.
A birthday is a celebration of the anniversary of a person's birth.
The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called birthdate or date of birth.
The date on which a person was born.
Day that comes once a year when a person celebrates the anniversary of his or her birth
A birthday is an occasion when a person or institution celebrates the anniversary of their birth.
The date on which a person was born

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the balloon emoji floats with a vibrant, glossy sheen, showcasing Apple's signature 3D rendering and realistic lighting. Its smooth, rounded form and bright, celebratory colors evoke a sense of joy and festivity. The subtle highlights on its surface suggest a playful bounce, making it perfect for conveying happiness, birthdays, or special occasions in your digital conversations.
